title: Gaming Gurus discord
body:
We are a diverse gaming community with friendly members who are happy to chat and game!
We play ~League of Legends ~Overwatch ~CSGO ~PUBG ~Minecraft ~Black Desert Online & more!
A new adventure awaits you at Gaming Gurus: https://discord.gg/fRaZCK7

note: 18+ ages required to join

replies.body:
Come join us! 

:DDDDDDDD

Ins0mniac aka Mark
